msbt.message: The best and worst part about sparklers is that they shine bright but burn out quickly, . It's such a great reminder to live in the moment and appreciate it!
Look at this! I've got my own private fireworks show going on here.I wish it lasted longer, but all good things must come to an end.
Holding a sparkler makes me a little nervous, but I just decided to throw caution to the wind and give it a try. Best decision ever, !
